command.name: csv2ofx
command.description: converts a csv file of transactions to an ofx or qif file.

option.name: source
option.description: source mapping to use, defaults to 'mint'

option.name: accountType
option.description: set default account type if match is not found, defaults to 'CHECKING'

option.name: collapse
option.description: account(s) to collapse (comma delimited), defaults to 'Accounts Receivable'

option.name: debug
option.description: enables debug mode, displays the options and arguments passed to the parser

option.name: outFile
option.description: location and name of resulting output file (use '-' to write to stdout), defaults to the project downloads folder

option.name: primary
option.description: primary account used to pay credit cards, defaults to 'MITFCU Checking'

option.name: transfer
option.description: treats ofx transactions as transfers from one account to another (sets 'category' as the destination account)

option.name: test
option.description: enables test mode, prints selection to the standard output without writing file to disk

option.name: variables
option.description: enables variable mode, displays the value of all program variables
